Posts.EditableText: When I check status then equip a helmet, typed as armor in the combat tab from combat.lib and given a 1 from(Protection (1-5) option then check status after wearing it, the defense stat is lowered by 1. Shouldn't it raise 1?
Posts.HTML: When I check status then equip a helmet, typed as armor in the combat tab from combat.lib and given a 1 from(Protection (1-5) option then check status after wearing it, the defense stat is lowered by 1. Shouldn't it raise 1?

Posts.EditableText:
Assuming this is my combat library,  then it can only handle complete armour outfits as written. It will assume your helmet is a full set of armour, and moving around in armour will reduce your agility, which will reduce your defence.

If you want to change that, copy the GetDefence function into your game.
